definitions.definition: To bend deeply at the knees while resting on one's feet.
To perform one or more callisthenic exercises by moving the body and bending at least one knee.

subdefinitions.definition: To exercise by bending deeply at the knees and then rising , while bearing weight across the shoulders or upper back.

definitions.definition: To occupy or reside in a place without the permission of the owner .
To sit close to the ground; to stoop , or lie close to the ground, for example to escape observation .
To bruise or flatten by a fall; to squash .
To retire a modeling kit or group of modeling kits.
examples: I can't believe they squatted my favorite faction!

main_definition: To bend deeply at the knees while resting on one's feet.
secondary_definitions: ( exercise ) To perform one or more callisthenic exercises by moving the body and bending at least one knee.
To occupy or reside in a place without the permission of the owner .
To sit close to the ground; to stoop , or lie close to the ground, for example to escape observation .
( dated ) To bruise or flatten by a fall; to squash .
( slang , board games ) To retire a modeling kit or group of modeling kits.
